Paint
Class UpdatePaintDraggedCommand

java.lang.Object
  Paint.PaintCommand<PaintClient>
      Paint.UpdatePaintDraggedCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class UpdatePaintDraggedCommand
extends PaintCommand<PaintClient>

Description of UpdatePaintDraggedCommand: This class called UpdatePaintDraggedCommand extends PaintCommand and is the command that executes this method to check as the cursor is dragged. It creates a final long serialVersionUID that creates a unique thread for the command. It has a private instance variable that is a MouseEvent and it is set inside the constructor to what is passed in. It contains an execute method that update the dragg.

Version:
Final Version: May 6th, 2015
Author:
HCS Group: Siddharth Sharma, Luis Guerrero, Maverick Tudisco, Chintan Patel
